title: VW’s U.S. Chief Expected to Apologize at Congressional Hearing
text:
VW’s U.S. Chief Expected to Apologize at Congressional Hearing 
Published By: NYTimes - Today 
Michael Horn, president of Volkswagen’s American unit, is to face questions about the emissions testing scandal at a hearing of a House su...
